raw akas.title: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies

akas: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies (original title)
akas from release info: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies (original title)

1.title: Operation Ghost Stories: The Spies Next Door

episode of.title: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies (TV Series 2016– )

1.plot: Deep cover Russian sleeper agents have infiltrated the US and are living seemingly normal "American" lives. To neutralize this threat, the FBI begins one of the largest counter intelligence investigations in its history.

2.title: The Peacock: Merchant of War

episode of.title: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies (TV Series 2016– )

2.plot: After trying for more than two decades to take down infamous arms trafficker Monzer Al-Kassar, the DEA's elite Special Operations Division devises a way to infiltrate his inner circle with an unprecedented and risky sting operation.

3.title: TERROR in the SKY: To Catch a Hijacker

episode of.title: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies (TV Series 2016– )

3.plot: On November 23, 1985, Egypt Air Flight 648 left Athens, Greece bound for Cairo, Egypt. It would never reach its final destination. This is the story of that ill-fated flight, told firsthand by a passenger lucky enough to survive, a CIA officer who witnessed the event, and the FBI agents tasked with bringing the perpetrator to justice.

4.title: HAJI BAGCHO: The Godfather of Heroin

episode of.title: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies (TV Series 2016– )

4.plot: Elite DEA agents hunt down the world's biggest heroin trafficker amidst the Taliban insurgency in Afghanistan.

5.title: The Myers: Fidel's Personal Spies

episode of.title: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies (TV Series 2016– )

5.plot: After arresting the most notorious Cuban spy of all time, the intelligence community is shocked to learn that classified information is still being transmitted to Cuba. A new investigation focused on The State Department uncovers a husband and wife team engaged in a sophisticated web of espionage.

6.title: Crack 99: Defense Secrets for Sale

episode of.title: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies (TV Series 2016– )

6.plot: A group of Homeland Security Investigations special agents work together with the elite Defense Criminal Investigative Service to identify and capture a Chinese software pirate who threatens US national security.

7.title: HUNTING the ORDER: An American Terrorist Story

episode of.title: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies (TV Series 2016– )

7.plot: In 1984, a young charismatic leader, Bob Mathews, built an army of white supremacists with the goal of eliminating Jewish people from the face of the earth and overthrowing the U.S. government. The group, known as The Order, went on a crime spree- stealing millions and murdering an outspoken Jewish radio host. A group of FBI agents in the pacific northwest works to find and capture one of the largest domestic terrorist syndicates the US has ever seen.

8.title: THE NICHOLSONS: A Spy and His Son

episode of.title: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies (TV Series 2016– )

8.plot: In a story of betrayal against family and country - the FBI and CIA embark on a decade-long effort to catch the highest ranking CIA officer to ever commit espionage and his son, who also joined the spy game.

imdb.plot outline: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies is a documentary series that details important cases, missions and operations of the American intelligence community, told firsthand by the men and women who worked them. Producers collaborate with prominent intelligence, military and government agencies such as CIA, FBI, NSA, DIA, DOD, Homeland Security, The State Department, etc., to tell their stories in a non-political, objective way that spotlights the perspective of people that do the work.
imdb.title: Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies
plot: _Declassified: Untold Stories of American Spies_ (qv) is a documentary series that details important cases, missions and operations of the American intelligence community, told firsthand by the men and women who worked them. Producers collaborate with prominent intelligence, military and government agencies such as CIA, FBI, NSA, DIA, DOD, Homeland Security, The State Department, etc., to tell their stories in a non-political, objective way that spotlights the perspective of people that do the work.
